sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le ciel est bleu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sky is blue.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ hěn kě, xiǎng hē diǎn shuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai très soif, je voudrais boire de l'eau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm very thirsty, I want to drink some water.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Madame, combien ça coûte ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Auntie, how much is this?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette question est très difficile.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This question is very difficult.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shù shàng yǒu hěn duō niǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup d'oiseaux dans l'arbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many birds in the tree.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shùxué chéngjì hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses notes en mathématiques sont très bonnes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His math grades are very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette route est très longue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This road is very long.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī wǎn mǐfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi un bol de riz, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a bowl of rice.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè liàng chē yào èrshí wàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette voiture coûte deux cent mille.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This car costs two hundred thousand.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le panda est le trésor national de la Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The panda is China's national treasure.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces chaussures sont très confortables.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These shoes are very comfortable.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Combien ça fait en tout ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How much is it in total?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nos idées sont les mêmes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our ideas are the same.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille de plus en plus dur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is working harder and harder.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je t'attends depuis tout ce temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have been waiting for you all along.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te souhaite un joyeux anniversaire !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Wish you a happy birthday!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa jambe est blessée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His leg is injured.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zuò dàlóu shì qùnián jiàn de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce bâtiment a été construit l'année dernière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This building was built last year.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses progrès sont évidents.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His progress is obvious.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū de nèiróng hěn yǒuqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le contenu de ce livre est très intéressant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The content of this book is very interesting.
